# Origin & Offset Control the precise positioning of components using origin and offset attributes. ## Origin `view .html [ box red 100x100 [ origin: 10x10 ] ]` ## Offset `view .html [ box blue 100x100 [ offset: 50x50 ] ]` ## Combined Usage `view .html [ panel [ origin: 20x20 offset: 10x10 text "Positioned content" ] ]` ## Use Cases - Precise component positioning - Creating custom layouts - Implementing drag-and-drop - Building overlay systems ## See Also - [Alignment](/wiki/core/layout/alignment-valign/) - Alignment options - [Scope & Nesting](/wiki/core/layout/scope-nesting/) - Scoped layouts
